mulan.regressor.transformation

Class RegressorChain

  • java.lang.Object
    • mulan.classifier.MultiLabelLearnerBase
      • mulan.regressor.transformation.TransformationBasedMultiTargetRegressor
        • mulan.regressor.transformation.RegressorChain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, MultiLabelLearner, TechnicalInformationHandler

    public class RegressorChain
extends TransformationBasedMultiTargetRegressor
    This class implements the Regressor Chain (RC) method. 4 alternative methods to obtain the values of the meta features are implemented.
    For more information, see:
    E. Spyromitros-Xioufis, G. Tsoumakas, W. Groves, I. Vlahavas. 2014. Multi-label Classification Methods for Multi-target Regression. arXiv e-prints.
    Version:
    2014.04.01
    Author:
    Eleftherios Spyromitros-Xioufis
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  RegressorChain.metaType
      The 4 alternative methods to obtain the values of the meta features.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected ArrayList<Integer>[] selectedFeatureIndices
      When the base regressor is capable of attribute selection this ArrayList holds the indices of the normal feature variables that were selected in each target's model.
      protected ArrayList<Integer>[] selectedTargetIndices
      When the base regressor is capable of attribute selection this ArrayList holds the indices of the target variables that were selected in each target's model.

      • Fields inherited from class mulan.classifier.MultiLabelLearnerBase

    • Field Detail

      • selectedTargetIndices

        protected ArrayList<Integer>[] selectedTargetIndices
        When the base regressor is capable of attribute selection this ArrayList holds the indices of the target variables that were selected in each target's model.

      • selectedFeatureIndices

        protected ArrayList<Integer>[] selectedFeatureIndices
        When the base regressor is capable of attribute selection this ArrayList holds the indices of the normal feature variables that were selected in each target's model.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RegressorChain

        public RegressorChain(Classifier baseRegressor)
               throws Exception
        Creates a new instance with the given base regressor. If chainSeed == 0, the default chain is used. Otherwise, a random chain is created using the given seed.
        Parameters:
        baseRegressor - the base regression algorithm that will be used
        Throws:
        Exception - Potential exception thrown. To be handled in an upper level.

      • RegressorChain

        public RegressorChain(Classifier baseRegressor,
                      int[] aChain)
               throws Exception
        Creates a new instance with the given base regressor and chain ordering.
        Parameters:
        baseRegressor - the base regression algorithm that will be used
        aChain - a chain ordering
        Throws:
        Exception - Potential exception thrown. To be handled in an upper level.

      • buildInternal

        protected void buildInternal(MultiLabelInstances trainSet)
                      throws Exception
        Description copied from class: MultiLabelLearnerBase
        Learner specific implementation of building the model from MultiLabelInstances training data set. This method is called from MultiLabelLearnerBase.build(MultiLabelInstances) method, where behavior common across all learners is applied.
        Specified by:
        buildInternal in class MultiLabelLearnerBase
        Parameters:
        trainSet - the training data set
        Throws:
        Exception - if learner model was not created successfully

      • makePredictionInternal

        protected MultiLabelOutput makePredictionInternal(Instance instance)
                                           throws Exception
        Description copied from class: MultiLabelLearnerBase
        Learner specific implementation for predicting on specified data based on trained model. This method is called from MultiLabelLearnerBase.makePrediction(weka.core.Instance) which guards for model initialization and apply common handling/behavior.
        Specified by:
        makePredictionInternal in class MultiLabelLearnerBase
        Parameters:
        instance - the data instance to predict on
        Returns:
        the output of the learner for the given instance
        Throws:
        Exception - if an error occurs while making the prediction.
        InvalidDataException - if specified instance data is invalid and can not be processed by the learner
